Name: Haeundae Beach
Description: This is Busan's most famous and busiest beach, with a long stretch of golden sand and crystal-clear waters.

Name: Gwangalli Beach
Description: This beach is a bit quieter than Haeundae Beach, and it's a great place to watch the sunset and enjoy some street food.

Name: Dadaepo Beach
Description: Dadaepo Beach is made from sands deposited by the Nakdonggang River. It features shallow water and a wide sand beach suitable for children to enjoy.

Name: Songdo Beach
Description: This beach is located in the western part of Busan and is known for its cable car and skywalk, which offer stunning views of the ocean and city.

Name: Jagalchi Fish Market
Description: This market is one of the largest fish markets in Korea, and it offers a unique glimpse into the daily lives of Busan's fishermen.

Name: Gukje Market
Description: This traditional market is located in the heart of Busan and is one of the oldest and largest markets in Korea. You can find all sorts of goods here, including clothing, accessories, and souvenirs. It's also a great place to sample some local street food.

Name: Taejongdae
Description: This scenic park is located on the southernmost tip of Yeongdo-gu, and it offers stunning views of the ocean and cliffs.

Name: Yongdusan Park
Description: This park is located in the heart of Busan and is home to several attractions, including a large bell and a statue of Admiral Yi Sun-sin.

Name: Gamcheon Culture Village
Description: This picturesque hillside village is known for its colorful houses and narrow streets, and it has become a popular tourist attraction in recent years.

Name: Busan Tower
Description: This 120-meter-high tower offers panoramic views of the city and is a popular spot for tourists to take photos.

Name: Dongbaek Island
Description: This small island is located at the southern end of Haeundae Beach and is a popular spot for hiking and enjoying the scenic views. It's also home to the Nurimaru APEC House, which hosted the APEC summit in 2005.

Name: Busan International Film Festival
Description: This annual film festival is held in October and is one of the most prestigious film festivals in Asia. It's a great opportunity to see some of the latest and greatest films from around the world.

Name: Beomeosa Temple
Description: This ancient temple is one of the most important Buddhist temples in Korea and is famous for its beautiful architecture and serene atmosphere.

Name: Haedong Yonggungsa Temple
Description: This beautiful temple is located on a cliff overlooking the ocean and is one of the few seaside temples in Korea. It's known for its stunning architecture and serene atmosphere.

Name: Busan Museum
Description: This museum is located in the heart of the city and showcases the history and culture of Busan. It's a great place to learn about the city's past and present.

Name: Busan Modern History Museum
Description: This museum is located in a historic building that was once the Busan branch of the Bank of Korea. It showcases the history of Busan from the late 19th century to the present day.

Name: Coffee Mandalay
Description: This trendy cafe is known for its Instagram-worthy drinks, including their signature dalgona coffee. The cafe is located near Haeundae Beach and has a cozy atmosphere.

Name: Gorilla Brewing
Description: This cafe is located in the heart of Seomyeon and is known for its high-quality coffee and friendly service. They also offer a wide selection of pastries and baked goods.

Name: Pascucci
Description: This Italian coffee chain has several locations throughout Busan and is known for its high-quality coffee and pastries. They also offer a variety of sandwiches and salads.

Name: Werk Roasters
Description: This cafe is located near Haeundae Beach and is known for its stylish interior and excellent coffee. They roast their own coffee beans in-house, and they have a selection of pastries and desserts.

Name: Bricks Coffee
Description: This cafe is located in the picturesque neighborhood of Dongnae and is known for its industrial-chic interior and excellent coffee. They have a selection of pastries and sandwiches, as well as a small outdoor seating area.

Name: Waveon Coffee
Description: This cafe is located in gijang Busan has awesome view

Name: Starbucks Paledecz
Description: This Starbucks is at an excellent location at Haeundae beach

Name: Blackup Coffee
Description: Excellent hand drip coffee,Different type of hand drip and sample available for tasting

Name: Carin Yeongdo Place
Description: This is a nice quite cafe with an amazing view

Name: Momos Coffee
Description: Momos Coffee, a roastery and coffee house that represents Busan

Name: Park Hyatt Busan
Description: This luxurious hotel is located in the Haeundae Beach area and offers stunning ocean views. The hotel features a fitness center, spa, and several dining options.

Name: Lotte Hotel Busan
Description: This upscale hotel is located in the Seomyeon area and offers spacious rooms and suites with modern amenities. The hotel features a fitness center, pool, and several dining options.

Name: Hilton Busan
Description: This luxurious hotel is located in the Gijang area and offers stunning ocean views. The hotel features a fitness center, pool, and several dining options.

Name: Shilla Stay Haeundae
Description: This modern hotel is located near Haeundae Beach and offers stylish rooms with great views. The hotel features a fitness center, rooftop terrace, and several dining options.

Name: Paradise Hotel Busan
Description: This upscale hotel is located in the Haeundae Beach area and offers spacious rooms and suites with modern amenities. The hotel features a fitness center, pool, and several dining options.

Name: Grand Josun Busan
Description: This modern hotel is located near Haeundae Beach and offers comfortable rooms with ocean views.

Name: The Westin Josun Busan
Description: The Westin Josun is arguably the best hotel in Busan. It's location at the head of Haeundae Beach and besides the beautiful APEC peninsula

Name: Hotel Nongshim
Description: This upscale hotel is located in the Dongnae area and features a traditional Korean design. The hotel offers a fitness center, pool, and several dining options.

Name: Hotel Noah
Description: This boutique hotel is located in the Seomyeon area and offers stylish rooms with modern amenities. The hotel features a fitness center and a rooftop terrace.

Name: Stanford Inn Busan
Description: This budget-friendly hotel is located in the Seomyeon area and offers simple but comfortable rooms. The hotel features a fitness center and a rooftop terrace.

Name: Choryang Milmyeon
Description: This is a restaurant that is considered not only by foreign tourists but also by locals as one of the best places to eat in Busan

Name: Haeundae Wonjo Halmae Gukbab
Description: Wonjo Halmae Gukbab is located near Haeundae beach with a famous dish that many tourists love when visiting, which is gukbap with a history of 50 years.

Name: Boksoondoga F1963
Description: If you are a follower of Buddhism and want to find vegetarian dishes during your trip to Busan, then Boksoondoga F1963 is the ideal destination for you.

Name: Boi Brasil
Description: This European-style restaurant is famous for its unique steaks.

Name: Anga
Description: Rated as the best barbecue restaurant in Busan,The entire restaurant space is designed with wood and each table is equipped with a modern grill in the typical style of a Korean BBQ restaurant.

Name: Bornga
Description: Bornga is a world famous charcoal barbecue restaurant at the heart of BIFF Square in Busan. This Busan restaurant is famous for its quality of ingredients, hygiene and affordable prices.

Name: Obanjang
Description: Obanjang is a delicious barbecue restaurant in Busan that won the hearts of not only locals but also tourists. Every time they come to the restaurant, diners praise the quality of service and food.

Name: Nampo Samgyetang
Description: This restaurant was popular  and they proudly displayed their long existence since 1962 ( on the sign-boards outside).

Name: Spain Club - Busan Haeundae
Description: This place is famous for different type of spain food and also variety of wines

Name: Namaste Haeundae
Description: This place is famous for authentic Indian food and it is located near Haeundae
